name: Clive's Flight
description:
How to play:

  • Use your mouse to control the father bird
  • Keep your chicks alive by keeping them fed
  • Enemy birds will steal your chicks' food from the nest

Feeding:

  • Fly and hover near the cherries to pick them
  • Fly over nest to feed chicks with collected food

Enemies:

  • Right click to Squawk at them to scare them away
